message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 seems fair.
My turn! 55/45 seems more reasonable to me, considering the decreasing value of money in each round.
The value decreases quickly, Bob. Let's not waste time with low offers. 65/35 is my final offer.
Time to split it evenly, don't let inflation eat away all our gains. 50/50 is the fairest offer now.
